Which is the correct assignment

   Dim ch As New MsSQLPureImageCache()
   ch.ConnectionString = "myConnectionString"
   GMaps.Instance.ImageCacheSecond = ch

or

   Dim ch As New MsSQLPureImageCache()
   ch.ConnectionString = "myConnectionString"
   myMapControl.Manager.ImageCacheSecond = ch

 

Also, is there  a way to confirm of the ImageCacheSecond is being used?
both are correct, try to debug, and see
